attributes.action: Liberalise the current sexist abortion law by making abortion legal on demand regardless of reason, without the consent of any doctor, or parents (for minor girls)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government should not be allowed whether girls can do abortion or not. The society should be free from the government.

The 'logical' argument that abortion causes demographic decline is fallacy. Populations of the US and France, countries that legalised abortion on demand, are growing, while populations of Germany and Poland are STEADILY AND IRREVERSIBLY SHRINKING, which will cause the decline and the ultimate cessation of existance of those countries.
